summary: A comprehensive test suite for the run‑length analysis utilities, covering detection of first, last and longest runs, run‑length encoding helpers, date‑based filtering of runs, and counting of runs within sliding time windows, along with verification of windowed run events.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of run‑length computation functions used in climate index calculations, ensuring they handle various data patterns, edge cases, temporal filters, and windowed aggregations as expected.
